Zen Musical Harmonizer ZMH-1

Four takes on classic Pitch Shifting effects

  • Home 
  • Projects 
  • Zen Musical Harmonizer ZMH-1

Overview

Zen Musical Harmonizer ZMH-1 is Pivar Audioâ€™s first app in iOS. It has four different ways to harmonizer: Playable, Shifter, Pseudo-Smart and Octave.

It is primarily designed for guitar, but has many creative uses including a lot of fun with synthesizers, as well as interesting effects on vocals. Use it with Inter-App Audio and Audiobus.
